documentation.text:
@title Stablecoin Adapter contract
 @dev Handles deposit and withdrawal of stablecoins, along with emergency shutdown (caging) functionality.

devdoc.details: Handles deposit and withdrawal of stablecoins, along with emergency shutdown (caging) functionality.

params.usr: Address of the user to credit the deposit to.
Address of the user to credit the deposit to.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

params.usr: Address of the user to withdraw stablecoin to.

devdoc.title: Stablecoin Adapter contract

deposit(address,uint256,bytes).notice: Deposits stablecoin from msg.sender into the BookKeeper.

depositRAD(address,uint256,bytes).notice: Deposits stablecoin from msg.sender into the BookKeeper in RAD.

withdraw(address,uint256,bytes).notice: Withdraws stablecoin to a specified user.
